title: INRECO Tamil Songs
description: INRECO started its journey in Chennai (then Madras) in 70's and in a very short time established the label in the South with Film Hits in Tamil and Malayalam. Among the Greats who were brought to the fore were Illaiyaraja and T.Rajendran, to name a few. In Carnatic Classical, artistes like G.N.Balasubramaniam, M.L.Vasantkumari, Sudha Ragunathan, Bombay Jayshri, etc. lent their genius to the INRECO Label. HINDUSTHAN/INRECO has now entered the journey of recording contemporary music in Bengal,north-east and the south.

title: Travel Experience Sri lanka
description:
Is now a good time to travel to Sri Lanka?
Yes.

This time of year is what the travel industry classifies as ‚ÄúOff-Peak‚Äù Season. Which means you can often find great deals in pricing of accommodation, accommodation is less busy, so securing a room is easier than trying to do so at times of year that the Sri Lankan diaspora tend to return home to visit family.

Right now, security is also higher than it has ever been which can be an added peace of mind for tourists who are visiting a country for the first time. Also depending on how well your local economy is doing, a trip to Sri Lanka can be of great value currency-wise.

title: Tasting Tours
description:
Welcome to our tasting tours YouTube channel!

We're a team of foodies on a mission to explore and share the best dining experiences from Sri Lanka.

What are the footprints of the Buddha Buddhapada?


A symbol of the Buddha's presence,¬†a stone slab depicting his footprints (buddhapada) was a regular feature of Buddhist monastic architecture in southern India

title: Channa Perera Films
description:
The movie, ‚ÄòYugathraa‚Äô (Beyond Reality) is the fourth film directed by well-known actor and director Channa Perera, who had massive success in his maiden movie, ‚ÄòAnjalika‚Äô.It is one of the turning points in Sri Lankan films. industry. Channa has more than 25 years of experience in the television and film industry and has won many prestigious awards for his work as an actor and director.

The film, ‚ÄúYugaathra‚Äù is a psychological thriller depicting a love triangle between two girls and a man and has underlying themes of the dichotomy of love and hate, reincarnation and tragedy with an unexpected twist.

The movie is enlightened by the talents of the famous, veteran, and award-winning stars of the Sri Lankan film industry; Sanath Gunatilake, Nadeeka Gunasekara, Channa Perera and Lakshman Mendis along with young upcoming stars; Mashi Siriwardana and Asanki De Silva. ‚ÄòYugathraa‚Äô was shot in some of the beautiful locations in Sri Lanka.It is suitable for the whole family to enjoy.

title: Butterfly Peace Garden Batticaloa
description:
The Butterfly Peace Garden (BPG) is a non-governmental organization established in Batticaloa, Sri Lanka in 1996. Since that time the BPG has provided counselling and support to children traumatized by civil conflict in the region. In late 2004 the BPG also became a center for helping victims of the tsunami which devastated the Batticaloa area. The BPG and its staff have been supported by a variety of local and international agencies.

The Butterfly Peace Garden (BPG) is a center focused on empowering children and youth through the use of indigenous creative art and cultural ritual. The center is committed to creating a serene, jubilant, and non-violent world for the people that visit it. Activities are conducted by adult animators skilled in one or more artistic discipline, who have in many cases experienced psychological wounds similar to those of the children who come to the BPG.

title: Kurundi Ancient Buddhist Monastery, Mullaitivu
description:
Official Channel for Kurundi Ancient Buddhist Monastery, Mullaitivu.


According to Mahavamsa, the Kurundi Ancient Buddhist Monastery (Kurundavashoka) was built by king Kallatanaga (109-104 BC) and records various donations by king Aggabodhi I (575-608) and king Vijayabahu I (1070-1110).

Kurundi Attakatha has been documented at the  Kurundi Ancient Buddhist Monastery (Kurundashoka Viharaya) in Piyangala(Kurundumale).  Locals also believe that Buddha has visited this place. 

A stupa, an image house, an inscription of a Sinhala king belonging to 9th ‚Äì 10th century, and statues of Buddha, and Bodhisattva were found at this place.

According to the archaeological report of 1905, Kurundumale had the most extensive ruins in the Northern Province. The Department of Archaeology is presently in the process of conservation of the stupa and other historic ruins.

title: Me and Europe (Sweden Home)
description:
Hello friends! Thanks for subscribing to us! 
We are a family who are traveling around Europe as a hobby but happy to share our experiences with you all. We are living in Sweden for years then and would like to show Swedish beautiful cultural activities, important days, lifestyle, geographical and climate changes. Actually, it is fun to live between +20 to -20 temperature days in amazing 4 seasons.

We have travelled 10 Europe countries including 3 Scandinavian countries from the start of our channel.
- Sweden
- Switzerland
- Norge
- Finland
- Denmark
- Italy
- Germany
- Belgium
- Luxembourg
- France
- Poland

Thank you so much for being with us!

title: Tamil Travel Couple | Indhu Dinesh
description:
We are 2 totally different people who fell in love accidentally and now happily married for almost 6 years! 

Our love for travel is the base for this channel. You will see a lot of not so touristy explorations on this channel. Occasionally we also post about the gadgets and automotives we own!üòÖChumma poduvom nu! Please do subscribe and show us some love‚ô•Ô∏è

Why this channel?
When we travel, we notice that the number of people who travel from Tamilnadu has been very minimal when compared to other states and when we looked at why this might happen, there is ultimately 2 reasons;
1) Hefty prices from travel agencies
2) Struggle with planning & budget

Our ultimate aim is to provide our people with all the travel tips and knowledge that we gain when we explore a country. We also share how we budget and curtail the expenses during our trips.

If we are able to do it, Why not you!!

P.S - This channel was earlier named as ID's Life but later renamed since this name suits what we love

title: Galle Wedding Films
description:
Galle Wedding Films is a candid wedding video production based in Galle, Sri Lanka. It is owned by filmmaker couple Leon & Nirmali. The creative duo is specialized in delivering the best quality wedding videos to young and fun couples who wants to save authentic emotions and memories of their wedding day.

Our young, friendly and spirited wedding video production team is devoted on offering you a joyful and relaxed experience and capture your emotions in high quality with our state of the art, professional video equipment.

We believe in Quality Over Quantity. So we only get one booking per day. And we don't use cheap video equipment. We are proud to say that "Galle Wedding Films" is the only place that offers full wedding video in 4K quality and live streaming facility in Galle. Being a professional audio engineer is a huge advantage Leon has when it comes to capture the audio of your wedding day in high quality and add a big value to your wedding film.

title: The Cinnamuncher
description:
The Cinnamuncher brings the World's First true Ceylon Cinnamon-wood Chew for dogs to satisfy their chewing instincts.

Dogs will give into their canine habits and start chewing into furniture legs, shoes, skirting boards or sofa cushions from the day they first start teething. Their ancestors had a bone to gnaw at in the wild in order to occupy itself during periods of rest and to clean its teeth. Our true Ceylon Cinnamon-wood Chews is 100% natural, eco-friendly solution packed with the health benefits of Ceylon Cinnamon or Cinnamomum Zeylanicum as an alternative to the many dog chews in the market with processed meat, additives and sugar.

Infused with the antibacterial and antiseptic qualities of Ceylon Cinnamon Oil, The Cinnamuncher‚Äôs Furfect Natural Dog Shampoo brings a refined aroma to calm the nervous system while moisture-locking organic ingredients such as Aloe Vera and virgin Coconut Oil work in synergy with a dog‚Äôs unique skin pH to protect the skin and preserve natural oils.

It is located in the royal palace complex which houses the Relic of the tooth of Buddha. Since ancient times, the relic has played an important role in local politics because it is believed that whoever holds the relic holds the governance of the country.

title: Cooking with Chef Shani
description: I am Shani. I have been in the culinary industry for about 14 years. I am a chef, restaurateur, and graduate of commercial cookery and hospitality management, living in Australia. In my work, I am always lucky to try and learn about multicultural food.  Having lived in different countries and societies has pushed me to create and experiment with new dishes constantly. But every day I prepare traditional Sri Lankan meals for my family, and I believe I have been greatly influenced by my mother and inherited that talent from her. I am an adventurous cook, a menu daydreamer, and a reader of cooking books. I make a lot of comfort food for my family because I love homestyle cooking. I love to think about, write about, share, and eat food. My true passion, however, is helping others discover their love of cooking. I am far from considering myself a chef, but I feel confident in my cooking skills, and I know you can feel the same way. So stay with me. Let's cook.

title: The Fab
description:
Since 1979 with years of experience and commitment to our customers, a goal that has remained a constant is to strive for a synergy between traditions from our humble beginnings, and all that we have learnt in the years gone by. This formula, along with our uncompromising quality and taste, is what has strongly grounded us as an indisputable brand name in the food and beverage industry.

Fab is renowned for signature cakes and gateaux. This trademark can be traced back to 1979 when Chandra Madanayake launched her confectionary store in her front garden beside Galle Road. The outlet remains present to this day, still teeming with ever-eager customers.

We cater to our customers‚Äô desires, going above and beyond to earn their trust in bringing them the choicest products and services. With our many strategically placed outlets in and around Colombo for ease of access, we remain the pioneering pastry shop franchise in Sri Lanka.

title: Good Neighbors Sri Lanka
description:
"Good Neighbors Sri Lanka (GNSL), established in 2008, is part of Good Neighbors International, active in over 40 countries. GNSL uplifts vulnerable children and communities through sustainable development programs focused on education, child protection, health, hygiene, WASH, and livelihoods. We provide school supplies, promote menstrual hygiene, build water systems, and support income generation, especially for women. In times of crisis, GNSL delivers emergency relief and promotes disaster preparedness. Through strong partnerships and community engagement, including events like GNSL Anniversary Week, we create lasting, meaningful change for a better future.
"

title: POLONNARUWA CLINICAL SOCIETY
description:
Since its establishment in 1986, The Polonnaruwa Clinical Society (PCS)  has been active in the areas of continuing medical education and health research for the last 35 years. 

Its membership, consisting of Specialists in multiple fields , Doctors , medical students and scientists working in the medical and dental professions.

PCS has its  weekly Lecture series now conducting as hybrid and  virtual lectures due to current COVID pandemic.

The Polonnaruwa Medical Journal (PMJ) is the official annual publication of the Polonnaruwa Clinical Society (PCS) .

Our mission is to be an innovative clinical society in Sri Lanka to disseminate clinical knowledge and to have the best clinical educational  web portal for clinicians and general public while actively contribute towards community supportive initiatives in Polonnaruwa District.

Our vision is to be an out standing clinical Society to support continuing CME & public health education among doctors and general public in Sri Lanka.

You can also learn more about us over on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/sakwithiarts

Keshi Dance Academy is a premier dance institute in Sri Lanka, offering expert training in both traditional and contemporary dance forms. From Low Country, Kandyan, and Sabaragamuwa styles to modern Western techniques, the academy caters to dancers of all skill levels. Tailored programs help young beginners build a strong foundation, while intermediate and advanced students refine their craft under the guidance of seasoned professionals.

Beyond training, Keshi Dance Academy specializes in choreographing performances for weddings, competitions, and corporate events. With a team of expert instructors and internationally recognized certifications, the academy is committed to shaping skilled dancers and elevating the art of dance to new heights.

title: SaLaRu Sri Lankan Cultural Academy
description:
Saliya Ilankoon - Choreographer/dancer:

Saliya Ilankoon is a Sri Lankan Professional Dancer, who began his vibrant artistic career with mastering traditional Sri Lankan dance and drums, and then completed his BFA (Dance and Drama Special) from University of The Visual and Performing Arts in Sri Lanka. He also obtained Visharad (Bharatanatyam) from Bhatkande Sangit Vidyapit, Lucknow, India. Saliya then expanded his horizons over international stage as a Professional Dancer and a Drummer in the world renowned Channa-Upuli Performing Art Foundation, performing over 15 countries. Recently Saliya moved to US and currently he is the Director of the SalaR·ø° ‚Äì Sri Lankan Cultural Academy, Houston, Texas.

title: Ceylon Movie House
description:
At Ceylon Movie House, we're dedicated to delivering high-quality movie reviews and explanations for our audience. We recognize that the films we analyze represent the immense creativity, effort, and dedication of numerous individuals and teams. Therefore, we are committed to giving full credit to the rightful owners of the movies we feature on our channel.

If you believe that any content on our channel infringes upon your copyright, please don't hesitate to contact us. We will promptly investigate and address the issue to ensure compliance with copyright laws.



Our mission is to provide insightful and entertaining content for movie enthusiasts while fostering creativity and collaboration within the film community.

title: London to Colombo
description:
As I have lived in London for over 33 years and have contributed in many ways to cascade information from London to Sri Lanka through various sources and TV channels, this is a humble attempt to bring another dimension to that effort.

London to Colombo is a channel dedicated to showing history, culture and heritage as well as the simple day-to-day life in London to our audiences in Sri Lanka and Sri Lankans around the World.

We strive to achieve this by giving you in-depth analysis and historical facts with amazing videos to educate and entertain you with information and fun facts.

Your feedback is extremely important to us for our betterment and enhancement of future documentaries, so it would be greatly appreciated if you could leave a comment.

title: Batti Style Cooking
description:
Hi everyone!
Welcome to Batti Style Cooking.
This channel will entertain you with most interesting Batticaloa style recipes. Batticalo is eastern part of Sri Lanka. Batticaloa lagoon has a large variety of fish that cannot be found anywhere else in Sri Lanka. Each type of fish has a different method of cooking and also there is a special recipe for leafy vegetables. you can expect the unique and traditional food and cooking methods of Batticaloa and more interesting topics on this channel.

If you have tried any of posted recipes, please do let me know your thoughts! this will help to improve my channel.

Please WATCH ALL VIDEOS completely then LIKE, SHARE , COMMENT and SUBSCRIBE.

title: Manula Music
description:
MANULA NIPUN is an emerging singer from Sri Lanka who has made a significant impact in the music scene since his debut. He received vocal training from the esteemed musician Master  Nadeeka Guruge , which has contributed to his development as an artist. His first single, "SIYADA," was released in 2021 and showcased his talent, featuring music and melody composed by renowned musicians Tharindu Damsara  and Sanjula Himala , with lyrics written by Reverend Ruhunuketha Dhammadewa Himi .
Following the success of his debut, Manula's second song, "MAL MADIRAWE," was released, showcasing the music direction of popular Sri Lankan producer Lahiru De Costa  and lyrics by the well-known Yashodha Adhikari . 
Another notable track, "ADA MAA THANIYE," features the combined creativity of Mahiru Senarathne , who took charge of the lyrics, melody, and music.

title: Anoma's Kitchen
description:
Hello Everyone! I'm Anoma Wijetunga. And this is my Official Youtube Channel: Anoma's Kitchen, Started on July 30th 2016.The best place for delicious and authentic Sri Lankan recipes with easy to follow steps.

I believe that the young generation is getting further and further away from the kitchen and are eating out most of the time. My goal is to get the young generation of Sri Lanka interested Not only in Sri Lankan And International Cooking, but also in Easy Cooking.  I hope to make their busy lives much more convenient and also promote the love of cooking based on my personal experience. I hope you enjoy this Channel and start to fall in love with cooking. 

Happy Cooking!
Anoma, with Love.

title: Traditional Me
description:
I‚Äôm Nadee and I live in a village in Sri Lanka far away from the city life. I dedicate a lot of time to my hobby which is making delicious food for my family. I love to cook local Sri Lankan food and the Indian which is from our neighbouring country and also the Arabic and the Malay food because Sri Lanka is a multi cultural country. Also you may see my own innovations as well.

In this modern world, you might wonder why I appear to live like someone lived in the past. I prefer to live my traditional life because I believe by picking new technology over traditional methods of preparation, we lose out the original taste and the ‚Äúsoul‚Äù of the food we eat. Therefore I always try to follow traditional methods in cooking.

So, I invite you to take a peek at my simple and traditional life surrounded by the lush greenery and rich culture, doing what I love. To me, the biggest happiness is spending time with my younger Brother also with my Grandmother and I really love that "Traditional Me".

description:
Old channel name mr tamilan thoughts is now renamed to Mr Tamilan Indian Movies. Discover the vibrant world of Indian cinema and be captivated by its rich storytelling and breathtaking visuals in Tamil 

Indian cinema, which consists of motion pictures made by the Indian film industry, has had a large impact on world cinema since the late 20th century. The Indian film industry is composed of various film industries, including Bollywood, which makes motion pictures in the Hindi language and is one of the biggest film industries in the country. Other prominent film industries are that of Bengali, Marathi, Odia, Punjabi, Gujarati, and Bhojpuri. Major centers of film production across the country include Mumbai, Hyderabad, Chennai, Kolkata, Kochi, Bangalore, Bhubaneswar - Cuttack, and Guwahati. Indian cinema is a global enterprise and its films have attracted international attention and acclaim throughout South Asia.

WHAT IS AYURVEDA?
In Sanskrit, an ancient language in India, where ‚ÄúAyurveda Treatments‚Äù originated the term meaning of AYURVEDA is as follows;

title: Mahinda Rajapaksha College Matara Official
description: Mahinda Rajapakse College was opened on the 17th of February 2013 by the former President Mahinda Rajapakse, is not only a school limited to the Southern Province but also to the whole country. The school was an innovative gift to the students of the whole country offering them a fresh and novel experience in the school system in Sri Lanka. Mahinda Rajapakse College presently has the capacity for more than 2000 students, 100 teachers. MRCM offers education from grades 6 to 13 with an A/L section with Arts, Commerce, Maths, Science and Technical streams. It is a place where the lives of the students are developed qualitatively with the intention of producing better citizens to the whole country.

title: Travel places in Sri Lanka
description:
Travel places in Sri Lanka introduce 

Sri Lanka, known as the "Pearl of the Indian Ocean," is a beautiful island nation located in South Asia. It offers a diverse range of attractions, including stunning landscapes, ancient ruins, vibrant cities, and pristine beaches. Here are some travel places in Sri Lanka that you should consider visiting:

Colombo: The capital city of Sri Lanka is a bustling metropolis with a mix of modern skyscrapers and colonial architecture. Explore its markets, visit the National Museum, and enjoy the vibrant nightlife.

Kandy: Located in the heart of Sri Lanka, Kandy is a UNESCO World Heritage site famous for the Temple of the Tooth Relic. It's surrounded by scenic hills, tea plantations, and the picturesque Kandy Lake.

Sigiriya: Climb the iconic Sigiriya Rock Fortress, a UNESCO World Heritage site, which boasts ancient rock frescoes, beautiful gardens, and breathtaking views of the surrounding countryside.

title: The Flame Tree Estate & Hotel
description:
The jungle luxe retreat

Abandoned in war, reclaimed by nature, and, now, gorgeously restored, The Flame Tree Estate & Hotel is a working organic spice plantation stretching across the Kandyan jungle and close to many of the island‚Äôs great attractions.  Hidden within is the meticulously restored Walawwa Hotel, decorated with European and Asian art, antique Colonial furniture and objets d'art.  

The essentials of easy living discreetly unpin the Hotel: an infinity pool, Wi-Fi, bone china, silver cutlery, working wells, on demand yoga & massage, jungle walks, an independent generator, white linen, sunsets to die for; food that is fine, comforting, and fresh; a vast booklover‚Äôs library, a harem of dizzy white goats; extensive kitchen gardens, miniature Schnauzers dispensing love; Nurseries for orchids, anthuriums, endangered trees and immodest shrubs; the haunting songs of hundreds of birds; and most important of all, an outstanding and engaging family of staff.

Come ‚Äì And Find Peace.

title: Dance with Nadeesha
description:
Hi, I'm NADEESHA....
Welcome to my Dance Channel , Dance with Nadeesha.  I'm a dance teacher, a dance choreographer. I have sixteen years of dance experience. I'm a graduate of the University of Visual and Performing Arts with a First Class Honors degree. This you tube channel is for all who you want to learn dance but don't have the time to take classes. Upcountry (Kandyan), Low Country and Creative (Sinhala and Hindi) dance videos are available on this channel. Also, this channel provides knowledge to all those who want to learn dance acquire basic dance knowledge. Don't forget to subscribe.

title: Sri Lanka Sign Language - Nishu
description:
Sri Lankan Sign Language (SLSL) is a completely free online educational resource for beginners like parents of deaf children, teachers and students. 
This will teach you how to finger spell Sinhala, Tamil and English alphabets for use in finger spelling names of people, towns and other nouns which the deaf community can use widely in Sri Lanka.

The resource material will also include a video dictionary containing many words used in everyday life.

Shamila Kurukulasuriya has created and developed 5 basic Sri Lankan Sign Language Workbooks for Deaf preschool children, and parents to learn sign language to teach their deaf children. These books are used widely for teaching pre-school deaf children in Sri Lanka.

title: Kevin Smokio - Topic
description:
The year of 2014 Smokio became a member of an upcoming rap crew named ‚ÄúDurty 4 Four‚Äù (44 Kalliya) and started his music career as a professional rapper.

Through 44 kalliya, Smokio had the chance to meet the famous music producer Iraj. By seeing Smokio‚Äôs talents Mr. Iraj invited Smokio to sign with his record label. So the year of 2016, Smokio joined Illinois records and released his first single and the most hit song of his career ‚ÄúMudukkuwen Eliyata‚Äù

After the treatments, Smokio trained as a staff member at the same rehabilitation center and started doing programs for drug-addicted youth. After spending 2 1/2 years in a rehabilitation center, he comes back to the music industry in the year 2020 as Kevin Smokio and did the real hit song ‚ÄúLiya Liya‚Äù which is produced by Chamath Sangeeth and featured by famous singer Dilki Uresha.

With this song, Kevin Smokio inspired the Sri Lankan youth as a survivor. And became a role model to them by stepping away from drugs and from his explicit lifestyle. 

And now Kevin Smokio is a professional and an independent Rap Artist in Sri Lanka.

title: Best of Sri Lanka Tour
description:
The Best of Sri Lanka Tour offers intimate, specialised tours through the south of this enthralling island. We concentrate on architecture, fabulous food and the rich history and culture. And if you‚Äôre thinking of buying or investing in Sri Lanka, we give an overview of what‚Äôs possible.
